alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 9:52AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Goliad County through 1015 AM CDT... At 952 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Nordheim to near Runge to near Charco to 8 miles northeast of Tulsita. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
